content:
All of them came to the territory of the Velikopysariv community, which was also fired from mortars (58 explosions) and a grenade launcher (10 explosions).

About thisShe reported March 21Sumy Regional Military Administration.

Over the past 24 hours, Khotinskaya, Belopilsk, Krasnopil, and Busi-Buda communities were also fired.

In the Belopil community, the enemy beat from the RSSV (12 explosions).

In the middle-and-Buda community, the enemy struck artillery (4 explosions), and dropped 2 mines.

The Hotin community was fired at mortars (6 explosions).

One explosive device was thrown from the UAV.

Asreported the armyinformFive people disappeared after Kharkiv.
title: The enemy dropped 5 -managed aviation bombs in Sumy region
description: This was reported on March 21 by the Sumy Regional Military Administration. Over the past day ...
author: Army Inform
